title: Client Champion Select Frozen on 0 seconds - When Banning
body: The Game froze when someone on the enemy team was banning at 0 seconds, they selected Xayah, to ban then the client froze, but i could open the characters select, but not change them.. i have a video of it as well.. for proof

replies.body: Oh man that sucks that your client ran into some errors during champion select. Most likely, some of the game files somehow became damaged or corrupted. I want to make sure you have a clean install, so I'd suggest running a repair through the client options. Let me know if that helps you get through champion selects!

Same thing just happened to me.

Riot PLEASE fix this. It's happened to me 3 times now.
